sentences.sContent: Six identical triangles can be formed by drawing two straight lines through an octagon's center point.
sentences.sContent_eng: Six identical triangles can be formed by drawing two straight lines through an octagon's center point.
sentences.sCn: 经过八角形的中心画两条直线，能够得到六个一样的三角形。

sentences.sContent: Why It's Innovative: A hydraulic system built into the bridge's handrail allows it to retract and curl into an octagon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Why It's Innovative: A hydraulic system built into the bridge's handrail allows it to retract and curl into an octagon.
sentences.sCn: 创新点：这座桥的栏杆使用了液压驱动系统，使之能收缩卷曲成八边形。

trans.tranOther: a flat shape with eight sides and eight angles
